notes: Implemented Mock Thread Fixtures feature with TranscriptParser, MockAudio, and FixtureLoader. The TranscriptParser handles the specific markdown format from resources/chat_transcripts/ with speaker patterns (Jacob/Elyse/Elise) and quoted dialogue. MockAudio generates synthetic waveforms (sine wave, white noise, speech-like) for testing without real TTS. FixtureLoader combines both components and exposes getMessages() and getMoodAnnotations() methods. All 61 tests pass including integration tests with real transcript files.
